about_the_game:
When a time traveling experiment goes awry because it turns out Henry Ford was a bit of a Nazi--oops--you'll need to travel through corrupted timelines to take out secret fascists and forgotten Nazi war criminals. You'll meet real resistance figures, find "degenerate art" to inspire insurrection, and slaughter history's fascist monsters. Along the way, you'll dual wield forgotten sci-fi weapons, melt faces with a wicked guitar, and ride the streets of LA on dinosaurs.

And you'll definitely kill Baby Hitler. A lot.

Features

  • Battle fascism across the timeline - from post apocalyptic 1994 to Pinochet's Chile to ancient Hyperborea and beyond!

  • Hand-crafted 2D sprites and pixel art

  • Custom engine that delivers 90s nostalgia along with modern framerates, massive arenas, and awesome physics. Every drop of blood is a physics object! 3D Autotiling! 90’s Mirror Tech™! WOW!

  • Large-scale battles where bands of resistance fighters take on hordes of enemies. The only thing better than killing Nazis is doing it at scale.

  • Real history mixed in with enough lies to be funny. Did you know that Stanford's first President was the inspiration for Hitler's eugenics program? Did you know that Nazi sympathizing congressmen tried to overthrow the Presidency of FDR in the 30's? Did you know that Einstein liked to say "I'll solve for the heat-death of the universe after I get my Twinkies?" Two of these things are true!

  • Explosions. Lots of explosions.

  • Seriously, the guitar melts faces.

  • Just the right blend of old school FPS action with dialogue, secret hunting, and side questing.  Fans of Wolfenstein, Blake Stone, Strife, and Rise of the Triad will feel right at home!

  • Moddability : Roadmap includes in-game map editor and full source code after launch!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains frequent violence against Nazis, fascists, and sometimes Baby Hitler.  The violence is pixilated and cartoonish, but is nevertheless fairly bloody.

Being battle against fascists across time, fascist iconography and symbolism (historical, modern, and fictional) appears frequently in the game in the context of spaces designed by the enemies you're fighting against.

There are relevant accessibility / performance options (eg. reducing blood particles, using alternate gun sounds) to tweak this but overall this content is inextricably core part of the game.

name: Killing Baby Hitler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes, needs a computer that can do graphics (Final requirements TBD, but any DX11 3D capable system should run it fine)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound recommended (any onboard sound should do)
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 60fps on Steam Deck
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Stop fascism in the cradle—travel through time and hunt down history’s most evil infant in this satirical old-school FPS.
